name: minus
caption: Minus

effect.short: Increases [Special Attack]{mechanic:special-attack} to 1.5× when a friendly Pokémon has []{ability:plus} or []{ability:minus}.
effect.full:
This Pokémon has 1.5× its [Special Attack]{mechanic:special-attack} if any friendly Pokémon has []{ability:plus} or []{ability:minus}.

This bonus does not count as a [stat modifier]{mechanic:stat-modifier}.  If either ability is disabled by []{move:gastro-acid}, both lose their effect.

flavorText:
Boosts the Sp. Atk stat of the Pokémon if an ally
with the Plus or Minus Ability is also in battle.
